description: This file provides helper functions for interacting with MongoDB collections related to connections, tokens, sync states, and audit logs within the unified connector persistence layer. It includes functions for upserting connection data, encrypting and storing tokens, fetching tokens, managing sync cursors, and logging audit events.

methods.name: AsyncIOMotorCollection _col(name: str)
methods.description: Helper function to get a MongoDB collection by name.

methods.name: str upsert_connection(workspace_id: str, connector_id: str, name: str, config: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Creates or updates a connection record in the 'connections' collection.

methods.name: str store_token(connection_id: str, token_plaintext: str, expires_at: Optional[datetime])
methods.description: Encrypts and stores a token for a connection in the 'tokens' collection.

methods.name: Optional[str] fetch_token_plaintext(connection_id: str)
methods.description: Retrieves and decrypts the latest token for a given connection.

methods.name: None put_sync_state(connection_id: str, cursor: Optional[str])
methods.description: Stores or updates the synchronization cursor for a connection.

methods.name: Optional[str] get_sync_state(connection_id: str)
methods.description: Retrieves the current sync cursor for a connection.

methods.name: str append_audit(actor: str, action: str, target_type: str, target_id: str, meta: Dict[str, Any])
methods.description: Records an audit log entry in the 'audit_logs' collection.

ctags.signature: (actor: str, action: str, target_type: str, target_id: str, meta: Dict[str, Any])

ctags.pattern: /^async def put_sync_state(connection_id: str, cursor: Optional[str]) -> None:$/
